articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: LIAM SCALES is on the verge of agreeing a contract extension at Celtic. Scales, whose current deal runs until June next year, looked to be on his [...]

articles.description: LIEL ABADA is in “a very good place” insists Brendan Rodgers during a challenging period for the Israeli winger. Abada has played just over half an hour of first team football during that three-month interlude, [...]

articles.description: KYOGO FURUHASHI brought down the curtain on 2023 with his breathtaking derby winner at Parkhead last weekend. It was the second time this season the Japanese speedster had fired in a spectacular points-clincher against the Govan club after doing likewise at Ibrox on September 3. The latest strike against Celtic’s city rivals was his tenth [...]

articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
Paul Sheridan (pictured with Shane backstage in the Barrowlands, along with Alan from Shebeen) travels from Glasgow to join us on Saturday 06 Jan for our tribute night to the late, great Shane MacGowan and the music of the Pogues. Paul has been performing as a musician for over 20 years. Best known as […]
The post TRIBUTE TO SHANE & THE MUSIC OF THE POGUES appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
